mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOMMODATION (ac_id, email_id, ac_title, ac_type, ac_address, ac_info, checkin, checkout, bu_name) VALUES (#{ac_id}, #{email_id}, #{ac_title}, #{ac_type}, #{ac_address}, #{ac_info}, #{checkin}, #{checkout}, #{bu_name})
mapper.update: update accommodation set email_id=#{email_id}, ac_title=#{ac_title}, ac_type=#{ac_type}, ac_address=#{ac_address}, ac_info=#{ac_info}, checkin=#{checkin}, checkout=#{checkout} where ac_id=#{ac_id}
